docs.snippet: With the end of the Oklahoma City Thunder’s season, the veteran Derek Fisher could have tantalizing opportunities as a coach or an executive, in television or even in politics — that is, if he does not continue playing....
docs.lead_paragraph: With the end of the Oklahoma City Thunder’s season, the veteran Derek Fisher could have tantalizing opportunities as a coach or an executive, in television or even in politics — that is, if he does not continue playing.
docs.abstract: Oklahoma City Thunder veteran Derek Fisher will have several tantalizing career opportunities should he choose to retire as a player after current season; 40-year-old guard could become a coach, an executive, or even try a career in television or in politics.

headline.main: Next Move for Fisher: Coaching, or Maybe Politics
headline.print_headline: Next Move for Fisher: Coaching, or Maybe Politics

docs.snippet: Ivory Latta scored 14 points and hit clutch shots in all three overtime sessions, and the Washington Mystics survived 31 turnovers for a 92-84 victory at home over the Los Angeles Sparks....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ivory Latta scored 14 points and hit clutch shots in all three overtime sessions, and the Washington Mystics survived 31 turnovers for a 92-84 victory at home over the Los Angeles Sparks.
docs.abstract: Washington Mystics beat Los Angeles Sparks, 92-84; other WNBA news noted.

docs.snippet: As an owner of the Nets when they were in New Jersey, Lewis Katz, who died Saturday in a plane crash, had a plan to help Newark, the state’s largest city....
docs.lead_paragraph: As an owner of the Nets when they were in New Jersey, Lewis Katz, who died Saturday in a plane crash, had a plan to help Newark, the state’s largest city.
docs.abstract: Lewis Katz, financier and philanthropist who died along with six others in Boston plane crash, attempted to leverage his part ownership of the New Jersey Nets in late 1990s and early 2000s to revitalize the city of Newark, NJ; while plan detoured and eventually dissolved, team enjoyed its greatest success in the NBA during Katz's ownership.

headline.main: Lewis Katz’s Vision for the New Jersey Nets Went Unrealized
headline.print_headline: Vision for Nets and Newark Went Unrealized

docs.lead_paragraph: The string of shootings followed an annual cycle of violence recognized by the New York Police Department: When the temperature rises, the level of violence climbs along with it.
docs.abstract: New York City Police Dept says at least 13 people are wounded in string of separate shootings across Brooklyn, the Bronx and Upper Manhattan; shootings follow what has been cycle of violence that rises along with the temperature.

headline.print_headline: At Least 13 Are Wounded by Gunfire Across the City
